name: Bobby, Pizza & SUrFing [iKON]
description:
iKON were going to have a beach party but big wave crushed the shore and washed of all the pizza! Help Bobby return it and save the almost ruined event.

Combine a puzzle group art with iKON members with the points you earn! =)


Disclaimer: iKON and related marks are owned by YG Entertainment. This fan-created game is not endorsed by, sponsored by, or affiliated with YG Entertainment.
